text: Professional and hardworking team at Multimedia Engineering. There are contractors who can be a nightmare to deal with after the contract has been signed. But working with Multimedia was not like that, and the end product came out to our satisfaction. Will work with them again!
Very energetic management, professional, and technical expertise on the field of architectural steel, spaceframe, tendons structure and creative roof covering system.

The best company to deal with for turnkey structures and innovative engineering. Always up to date with the new materials and technologies. The ADAS - ME team is always our first choice to assist us with any new project we are working on.
Bernd
Specialty Structures, Orlando
